## Basic SuSiE-Ann Synthetic Experiments

```{r}
susie_ann_opt_itr <- 2
num_trials <- 1
all_pi_1_true <- rep(0, num_trials)
all_pi_1_est <- rep(0, num_trials)
n <- 5
p <- 10
num_annotations <- 10
pve <- 0.4
num_loci <- 3
L <- 2
synth_data <- generate_synthetic_data_basic(pve, n, p, l, num_loci, num_annotations)
res <- susie_ann(synth_data$susie_ann_X, synth_data$susie_ann_Y, synth_data$A, num_loci, FALSE, num_loci, L=l, susie_ann_opt_itr = susie_ann_opt_itr, elbo_opt_steps_per_itr = 10)
analyze_susie_ann_fit(res, synth_data)

```
